com.client.core.security

Class SessionFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.client.core.security.SessionFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter

    public class SessionFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter
    Filter used to authentication all calls to the web application. Current implementation is only to allow calls that either
    1. Have an 'apiKey' parameter on them equal to the apiKey in the application settings file (i.e. the one injected into ApplicationSettings
    2. Have an encrypted 'apiKey' in the session. This essentially means that some previous request had an 'apiKey' url parameter and passed the filter.
